title: ************* Setup Knowledge Databases *************
content:
db_url = "postgresql+psycopg://ai:ai@localhost:5532/ai"
documents_db = PostgresDb(
    db_url,
    id="agno_knowledge_db",
    knowledge_table="agno_knowledge_contents",
)
faq_db = PostgresDb(
    db_url,
    id="agno_faq_db",
    knowledge_table="agno_faq_contents",
)
